name: code-scope-highlighter
description: Easily visualize the scope of matching brackets with customizable colors and flexible highlight modes.

codeScopeHighlighter.scopeColor.description: Color for highlighting the entire scope of matching brackets. (Hex format)

codeScopeHighlighter.bracketColor.description: Color for highlighting the matching brackets. (Hex format)

codeScopeHighlighter.matchBrackets.description: Choose when the scope highlight should be active: 'near' for when the cursor is near the bracket, 'always' to always highlight, and 'never' to never highlight.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
